__e: Either talk to her and get it over with or make a run for it.
If you see that man again, I want you to run and tell someone right away to call me, okay?
Deserting your friends and running off by yourself?
How does someone just run away from an accident like that without one neighbor seeing him?
You're running away from everything you believe in!
So why aren't you running away from me like the rest of the family?
I mean, he meant the world to you, and you meant nothing to him, and if you run away now, he'll never know.
You think you can come in here when I'm all disoriented and say the things I wanted you to say to me two years ago and make me run away with you?
I know you get sick of things and you run, but you can come home.
People are dying back home, and you want me to just run away with you?
You tell me to do the right thing, and then you run off with my case. Sarah isn't here with me.
And you make off with a million dollars no one even knows is missing.
And I eat, pray, love being a parole officer, even when I have to miss my best friend's wedding to track down a runaway bride.
This isn't like some Runaway Bride moment where I feel like there's someone else out there for me.
Because I've seen every runaway bride movie that there is, and I know that when the bride runs away, it's never because of a random kiss, all right?
I just wanted to make sure she didn't get away again.
And now... it's time for me to run away again.
But if you fly away on us again you can be sure we will.
And now... it's time for me to run away again.
But if you fly away on us again you can be sure we will.
No mother could be prouder... but I think it's time that you ran away from home.
